summary: Moderate air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 25 January to end of Tuesday 25 January GMT
description: Overcast and cold on Tuesday.<br/><br/>For the most part a very light breeze to almost calm conditions are expected. An Atlantic airflow is forecast to loop around and spend some time over the near continent before arriving in the south east and London. It's likely this may add some pollution to that which has already accumulated due to low dispersion conditions locally.<br/><br/>'Moderate' PM10 and PM2.5 are possible over the course of the day.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
